labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Formatting of audit log will be overwritten by markdown formatting for you channel topic
data.expected_result: Formatting of the changed channel topic event shouldn't be overwritten by the markdown formatting of your channel topic
data.short_description: Audit log: Markdown formatting for changed channel topic not shown correctly
data.steps_to_repro: - Change a channel topic to a text with markdown formatting like bold or italic text - Go to the audit log - See the action for changing channel topic - Click on the action to open the details and see your channel topic
